page.title: 18Clubs & Societies in:FINTRY
page.content: {Sports:} carpet bowling, bowling, curling, badminton, Strathendrick Rugby, riding, football, aerobics, squash, Riding for the Disabled Association. {Many of the above are organised by the Sports and Recreation Club. {Creative: art, drama, accordian and fiddle, recorder class, scottish country dancing. {Youth and Old People's Organisations: Cub Scouts, Brownies, toddlers' group, Playgroup, Sunday School, Guides, Silver Threads, Parent Teacher Association. {Women's Organisations: Scottish Women's Rural Institute, Kirk Women's Guild. {Organising Committees: Flower Show, Sheepdog Society, Hall, Best Kept Village, Community Council.
